mapper.select: SELECT S.id , S.title , S.content , S.color , S.repeat , S.start_t , S.end_t , (SELECT array_to_string(array(SELECT file_url FROM file F WHERE F.post_id = S.id),',')) AS file_urls FROM schedule S WHERE S.id = #{id}

SELECT S.id , S.title , S.content , S.color , S.repeat , S.start_t , S.end_t (SELECT array_to_string(array(SELECT file_url FROM file F where F.post_id = S.id),',')) as file_urls FROM schedule S
AND (TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(S.start_t, 'MM'), '99') = #{month} OR TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(S.end_t, 'MM'), '99') = #{month})
AND (TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(S.start_t, 'IW'), '99') = #{totalWeek} OR TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(S.end_t, 'IW'), '99') = #{totalWeek})
AND S.color = #{color}
ORDER BY S.start_t
